description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍，现任花莲县选举区立法委员、中国国民党立法院党团总召集人。曾任花莲县县长，因其政治作风被称为“花莲王”，并涉及多起司法案件。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, member of the Kuomintang, currently serving as a legislator for the Hualien County constituency and the convener of the KMT legislative caucus. He previously served as the Magistrate of Hualien County, is known as the 'King of Hualien' for his political style, and has been involved in multiple legal cases.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍，现任花莲县县长，傅崐萁的妻子。她与傅崐萁先后领导下的花莲县政府被合称为“傅氏王朝”。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, member of the Kuomintang, and the current Magistrate of Hualien County. She is the wife of Fu Kun-chi. The Hualien County Government under their successive leadership is collectively referred to as the 'Fu Dynasty'.

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁的父亲。
description.en: Father of Fu Kun-chi.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的一个政党，由宋楚瑜于2000年创立。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China, founded by James Soong in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国花莲县的最高行政首长职位。
description.en: The chief executive position of Hualien County, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国最高立法机关立法院的成员。
description.en: A member of the Legislative Yuan, the highest legislative body of the Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国国民党立法院党团

zh-cn: 中国国民党立法院党团

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党在立法院的议会党团。
description.en: The parliamentary group of the Kuomintang in the Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，亲民党创党人及首任主席。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, founder and first chairman of the People First Party.

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁等人于2003年至2004年间炒作合机公司股票的案件，最终导致傅崐萁在2018年被判刑定谳并解除县长职务。
description.en: A case in which Fu Kun-chi and others manipulated the stock of Heji Corporation between 2003 and 2004, which ultimately led to Fu's conviction in 2018 and his removal from the post of county magistrate.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任新北市市长，现任中国国民党主席。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, former Mayor of New Taipei City, and current Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 2025年初由公民团体发起的针对国民党籍立法委员傅崐萁的罢免行动。
description.en: A recall movement launched by civic groups in early 2025 targeting KMT legislator Fu Kun-chi.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国花莲县的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Hualien County, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾企业家，和硕联合科技董事长。因花莲地震捐款事宜与傅崐萁夫妇产生争议。
description.en: Taiwanese entrepreneur, Chairman of Pegatron. He had a dispute with Fu Kun-chi and his wife over donations for the Hualien earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国主要领导人之一，现任中共中央政治局常委、中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, currently a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官、政治人物，现任中共中央台湾工作办公室、国务院台湾事务办公室主任。
description.en: A diplomat and politician of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Director of the Taiwan Affairs Office of the CCP Central Committee and the Taiwan Affairs Office of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 指《环岛高速铁路建设特别条例草案》、《花东快速公路建设特别条例草案》和《国道6号东延花莲建设特别条例草案》三个法案的总称，因预估耗资巨大且缺乏可行性评估而备受争议。
description.en: A collective term for three draft bills: 'Special Act for the Construction of the Round-Island High-Speed Rail', 'Special Act for the Construction of the Hualien-Taitung Expressway', and 'Special Act for the Eastward Extension of National Freeway No. 6 to Hualien'. The bills are highly controversial due to their enormous estimated cost and lack of feasibility studies.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一个环境保护组织。
description.en: An environmental protection organization in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、医师，曾任台北市市长，现任台湾民众党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and physician, former Mayor of Taipei, and current Chairman of the Taiwan People's Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍立法委员。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and a member of the Kuomintang serving in the Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾新北市淡水区的私立综合大学。
description.en: A private comprehensive university located in Tamsui District, New Taipei City, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国广东省广州市的一所综合性大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university located in Guangzhou, Guangdong Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省曾经存在的省辖市，傅崐萁的出生地。
description.en: A former provincial city in Taiwan Province, Republic of China, and the birthplace of Fu Kun-chi.

nodes.id: 台湾民众党立法院党团

zh-cn: 台湾民众党立法院党团

description.zh-cn: 台湾民众党在立法院的议会党团。
description.en: The parliamentary group of the Taiwan People's Party in the Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物及外交官，民主进步党籍，现任中华民国副总统。曾任立法委员，在2020年选举中被傅崐萁击败。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and diplomat of the Democratic Progressive Party, currently the Vice President of the Republic of China. A former legislator, she was defeated by Fu Kun-chi in the 2020 election.

description.zh-cn: 傅兆林是傅崐萁的父亲。
description.en: Fu Zhaolin is the father of Fu Kun-chi.

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁与徐榛蔚于1995年结婚，2009年为任命其为副县长而离婚，后于2016年恢复婚姻关系。两人先后主政花莲，被称为“傅氏王朝”。
description.en: Fu Kun-chi and Hsu Chen-wei married in 1995, divorced in 2009 for her appointment as deputy county magistrate, and remarried in 2016. Their successive rule in Hualien has been termed the 'Fu Dynasty'.

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁出生于台中市。
description.en: Fu Kun-chi was born in Taichung City.

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁毕业于淡江大学交通管理学系，后获得中国大陆研究所硕士在职专班学位。
description.en: Fu Kun-chi graduated from the Department of Transportation Management at Tamkang University and later obtained a master's degree from the Graduate Institute of China Studies.

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁在担任立法委员期间，于广州暨南大学攻读国际关系学院法学博士学位。
description.en: While serving as a legislator, Fu Kun-chi pursued a Doctor of Law degree at the School of International Studies of Jinan University in Guangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁担任第十六、十七届花莲县县长，后因合机炒股案被判刑而解职。
description.en: Fu Kun-chi served as the 16th and 17th Magistrate of Hualien County, and was removed from office after being convicted in the Heji stock manipulation case.

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁曾任第5-7届及第10届至今的立法委员。
description.en: Fu Kun-chi served as a member of the Legislative Yuan for the 5th-7th terms and from the 10th term to the present.

relationships.target: 中国国民党立法院党团

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁于2024年2月1日起担任中国国民党立法院党团总召集人。
description.en: Fu Kun-chi has served as the convener of the KMT legislative caucus since February 1, 2024.

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁自2000年起拥有亲民党党籍，并曾担任其立法院党团总召。
description.en: Fu Kun-chi has been a member of the People First Party since 2000 and once served as the convener of its legislative caucus.

description.zh-cn: 因2009年违纪参选花莲县长，傅崐萁遭中国国民党开除党籍，直至2021年在党主席朱立伦主导下才得以重返。
description.en: Fu Kun-chi was expelled from the Kuomintang in 2009 for running for Hualien County Magistrate against the party's nomination. He was able to rejoin in 2021 under the leadership of party chairman Eric Chu.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国国民党主席的朱立伦主导通过“同舟计划”，使曾被开除党籍的傅崐萁得以重返国民党。
description.en: As the chairman of the Kuomintang, Eric Chu led the passage of the 'Tongzhou Plan', which allowed Fu Kun-chi, who had been expelled, to rejoin the party.

description.zh-cn: 在2000年中华民国总统选举期间，傅崐萁辅选无党籍候选人宋楚瑜。
description.en: During the 2000 ROC presidential election, Fu Kun-chi assisted the campaign of independent candidate James Soong.

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁因合机炒股案被判刑8个月定谳，并因此被解除花莲县县长职务。
description.en: Fu Kun-chi was sentenced to 8 months in prison for the Heji stock manipulation case, which was finalized, leading to his removal from the position of Hualien County Magistrate.

description.zh-cn: 2025年初，公民团体发起“微光花莲拔傅行动”，提案罢免时任立法委员的傅崐萁。
description.en: In early 2025, civic groups launched the 'Hualien Glimmer - Remove Fu Action' to initiate a recall against then-legislator Fu Kun-chi.

description.zh-cn: 在2020年立法委员选举中，傅崐萁以无党籍身份击败了寻求连任的民主进步党籍候选人萧美琴。
description.en: In the 2020 legislative election, Fu Kun-chi, running as an independent, defeated the incumbent Democratic Progressive Party candidate Hsiao Bi-khim.

description.zh-cn: 2024年花莲地震后，傅崐萁率国民党立委访问中国大陆，于北京人民大会堂会见中共中央政治局常委、全国政协主席王沪宁。
description.en: After the 2024 Hualien earthquake, Fu Kun-chi led a delegation of KMT legislators to mainland China and met with Wang Huning, a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 2024年4月，傅崐萁率团访问中国大陆期间，会见了国台办主任宋涛。
description.en: In April 2024, during his delegation's visit to mainland China, Fu Kun-chi met with Song Tao, Director of the Taiwan Affairs Office.

description.zh-cn: 作为国民党立法院党团总召，傅崐萁主导推动“花东交通三法”，因其庞大预算及可行性问题引发巨大争议。
description.en: As the KMT legislative caucus convener, Fu Kun-chi spearheaded the 'Hualien-Taitung Three Transportation Laws', sparking significant controversy due to its massive budget and feasibility issues.

description.zh-cn: 地球公民基金会等环保团体发起连署，诉求国会撤回花东交通三法。
description.en: The Citizen of the Earth, Taiwan and other environmental groups launched a petition calling for the legislative withdrawal of the Hualien-Taitung Three Transportation Laws.

description.zh-cn: 民众党主席柯文哲反对傅崐萁提出的成立“在野特侦组”的提议。
description.en: Taiwan People's Party Chairman Ko Wen-je opposed Fu Kun-chi's proposal to establish an 'opposition special investigation unit'.

description.zh-cn: 童子贤指控，在2018年花莲地震后，他欲直接捐助受灾国小重建时，受到时任县长傅崐萁领导的县政府施压，要求捐款必须通过县府统筹分配。
description.en: Tung Tzu-hsien alleged that after the 2018 Hualien earthquake, when he wanted to directly donate to a damaged elementary school for reconstruction, he was pressured by the county government under then-Magistrate Fu Kun-chi, which demanded that the donation must be centrally allocated by the government.

description.zh-cn: 针对童子贤关于捐款受县府施压的指控，傅崐萁与妻子徐榛蔚一同至花莲地检署提告童子贤加重诽谤及违反选罢法。
description.en: In response to Tung Tzu-hsien's allegations of being pressured by the county government over his donation, Fu Kun-chi and his wife Hsu Chen-wei filed a lawsuit against Tung at the Hualien District Prosecutors Office for aggravated defamation and violation of the Election and Recall Act.

description.zh-cn: 国民党立委柯志恩在讨论《财划法》草案时坦言，对于向党团总召傅崐萁提建言，她表示“不是她可以讲”，凸显了傅崐萁在党团内的强势领导风格。
description.en: When discussing the draft of the 'Fiscal Allocation Act', KMT legislator Ko Chih-en admitted that suggesting changes to caucus convener Fu Kun-chi was 'not something she could do', highlighting Fu's strong leadership style within the caucus.

relationships.source: 中国国民党立法院党团
relationships.target: 台湾民众党立法院党团

description.zh-cn: 自2024年新一届立法院开始，由傅崐萁领导的国民党党团经常与民众党党团在议案上进行合作。
description.en: Since the beginning of the new Legislative Yuan term in 2024, the KMT caucus led by Fu Kun-chi has frequently cooperated with the TPP caucus on legislative bills.
